MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete() cil managed
abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

summary.span: 通知 ，告知其不应该生成任何更多的消息也不应使用任何更多的延迟消息。

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后已在数据流块上调用，将完成的块，并将其处理以前提供的所有数据后，任务将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 将不会阻止等待完成发生，而是将发起请求; 但若要等待完成发生，可能使用任务。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 ，其表示数据流块的操作和完成。

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块被视为已完成，它当前不在处理一条消息，当保证它不会处理更多消息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 返回相关联的块已完成时，将转换为已完成状态。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 它将转换为状态时阻止完成其处理成功根据数据流块定义的语义。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block's defined semantics. 它将转换为时数据流块已完成处理过早地由于未经处理的异常，并将转换到状态时数据流块已完成的状态由于接收取消请求而导致过早地处理。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 如果任务完成时处于状态，其`Exception`属性将返回其中包含导致失败的块的一个或多个异常。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.

span.span: The that caused the faulting.

summary.span: 导致 在 状态下完成。

span.span: Causes the to complete in a state.

remarks.format: 之后`Fault`已在数据流块，阻止将完整的此类上调用该其任务将进入最终状态。After `Fault` has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, such that its task will enter a final state. 在出错块，作为与取消块，缓冲将导致消息 （未处理的输入的消息，以及 unoffered 的输出消息） 会丢失。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.
